entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bonaventure
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:48 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
